boardgame.name: Star Realms: Frontiers
boardgame.description: Star Realms: Frontiers is a new standalone Star Realms game with an 80-card trade deck and new scorecards that's suitable for play with up to four players. It can be combined with Star Realms and/or Star Realms: Colony Wars._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; About Star Realms_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Star Realms is a fast-paced game of space battles that combines the fun of a deckbuilding game with the interactivity of Trading Card Game-style combat. As you play, you make use of Trade to acquire new Ships and Bases from the cards being turned face up in the Trade Row._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You use the Ships and Bases you acquire to either generate more Trade, or to generate Combat to attack your opponent and their Bases. When you reduce your opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s score (called Authority) to zero, you win! Battle your friends or team up to play cooperatively against the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Features_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The default Star Realms: Frontiers box is listed with the following as its features:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gameplay for 1-4 players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Solitaire and Cooperative mode_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Plays on its own, or combined with any other Star Realms set._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; An all-new 80-card trade deck featuring some new mechanics like the double ally ability which really rewards you for focusing on a single faction!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Starting decks for four players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Four sets of new, easy-to-use score cards. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Plenty of Explorer cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Full color rulebook for two player PVP games, and awesome multiplayer formats like Free-For-All, Hunter, and Hydra!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A sturdy, attractive, 4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 6_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; x 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; game box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
